release.description: Changes since last milestone for this upcoming major release.
release.action: Maven managed dependency updates/additions: Apache Commons Lang 3.12.0, Apache Commons IO 2.11.0, Apache Velocity Engine 2.3, Apache HTTP Client 5.1, SLF4j 1.7.32, Jackson 2.13.0, Log4J 2.14.1, AWS Java SDK 1.12.78, Picocli 4.6.1, JUnit 5.8.1, Testcontainers 1.16.0.
